<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">ca7ad04647c9f110274adeae536d4396</macroponent><name>now_code_editor/isClientScript</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  if(api.state.scriptType || api.state.scriptType == 'true'){
    return true;
  }
	return false;
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-03 14:58:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>58349dc347723110274adeae536d4309</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>now_code_editor/isClientScript</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Application Explorer" source="x_13258_applicat_0">52fee90207db61102b80fe4f7c1ed041</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Application Explorer">52fee90207db61102b80fe4f7c1ed041</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_58349dc347723110274adeae536d4309</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-03 14:59:34</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
